usage.eng: A good dog deserves a good bone.

usage.cn: 坦白说，如果你不打算为爱做点傻事，你就不配拥有爱。——《相见恨早》
usage.eng: "Honestly, if you're not willing to sound stupid, you don't deserve to be in love."

usage.cn: 人活着 总是要得罪一些人的 就要看那些人是否值得得罪
usage.eng: When alive ,we may probably offend some people.However, we must think about whether they are deserved offended.

usage.cn: 勇敢的做自己，不要为任何人而改变。如果他们不能接受最差的你，也不配拥有最好的你。
usage.eng: Be yourself/Brave do yourself, don't change for anyone. If they don't like you at your worst, then they don't deserve you at your best.
